## Top 50 GO terms

Includes all ontologies: `BP`, `MF`, `CC`.

```{r readrds, include=FALSE}
ego <- readRDS("/ceph/project/cncb/albrecht/snakemake-cncb-ensembl-2024/results/enrichgo/hvgs.rds")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(ego, n = 50) %>% 
  select(-geneID) %>%
  knitr::kable("pipe")
```
